meanings.sent1: She always ends up misplanning her study schedule.
meanings.sent2: He misplanned the party and forgot to order food.
meanings.sent3: The misplanning of the camping trip led to everyone forgetting their tents.
meanings.sent4: Her misplanning was like trying to build a house without a blueprint.
meanings.sent5: Misplanning can cause a lot of unnecessary stress and confusion.

meanings.definition: The act of making a mistake in planning.
meanings.sent1: The misplanning of the event resulted in chaos.
meanings.sent2: His misplanning caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent3: The misplanning of the road trip turned into a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: The misplanning was a dark cloud hanging over the team's success.
meanings.sent5: Avoiding misplanning is key to a successful outcome.
